meanings.sent1: The unpasteurized milk tasted fresh and creamy.
meanings.sent2: It is important to refrigerate unpasteurized dairy products.
meanings.sent3: The unpasteurized cheese was the star of the picnic.
meanings.sent4: Her unpasteurized enthusiasm for the project was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The unpasteurized honey had a rich, natural flavor.

meanings.definition: Not treated with heat to kill bacteria.
meanings.sent1: I prefer unpasteurized apple cider for its natural taste.
meanings.sent2: Some people believe that unpasteurized juices have more nutrients.
meanings.sent3: The unpasteurized yogurt rebelled against the heat.
meanings.sent4: Her unpasteurized determination to succeed was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The unpasteurized meat carried a risk of bacterial contamination.

meanings.definition: Not processed to remove harmful microorganisms.
meanings.sent1: The unpasteurized eggs were used in the traditional recipe.
meanings.sent2: Consuming unpasteurized foods can pose health risks.
meanings.sent3: The unpasteurized water refused to be sanitized.
meanings.sent4: Her unpasteurized creativity brought a new perspective to the team.
meanings.sent5: The unpasteurized vegetables were grown organically.
